metadata.description: There's rich girls, and then there's Haru -- an ultra-rich heiress with more money than you could spend in your lifetime. She may be loaded, but she has to go to high school like everyone else -- and when you see everyone there as mere commoners, it might be just a little difficult to make friends. There's only one person who really hits it off with her: Tsurezure, an aloof hipster with a super-weird fashion sense. It's an unlikely friendship between oddballs in this heartwarming comedy about a couple of misfits, their high school class, and one long-suffering butler.
metadata.name: Ojojojo
